underlying_goal: Fix the issue where `go install` produces a binary with default/empty version information instead of the actual release version
friction_detail: User interrupted the first attempt, requiring a restart of the conversation.
brief_summary: User reported that `go install` binaries lacked proper version info; Claude diagnosed the root cause (ldflags not used with `go install`) and proposed using `runtime/debug.ReadBuildInfo()` as a fallback, but the session ended at the planning stage before implementation.
